name: comic-app
description: this app helps you keeping track of your comic book subscriptions

scripts.start: env DB_SERVER=localhost env DB=comic-app babel index.js
scripts.dev: env DB_SERVER=mongo env DB=dev nodemon --watch lib index.js --exec babel-node
scripts.test: export MUTE_CLI_LOG=true; env DB_SERVER=localhost env DB=test ./node_modules/.bin/mocha ./specs/index.js

author: Malte Sellmer
